help-file.title: SKILL_WARLOCK
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all skills and spells available to the Warlock class:
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h bludgeon, 1h piercing, 2h bludgeon, bandage, carve, climb, dodge, first aid, meditate, mount, quick chant, sorcerous spell knowledge, swim 10th level: clerical spell knowledge
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st circle: Sense Holiness, Sleep, Unholy Wind 2nd circle: Protection from Cold, Protection from Living, Unmaking 3rd circle: Invoke Negative Energy, Protection from Fire, Protection from Good, Remove Poison, Blindness 4th circle: Dispel Good, Lifelust 5th circle: Devitalize, Purge Living, Remove Curse, Unholy Strength, Heal Undead 6th circle: Cure Blind, Darkness, Frostbite, Nether Touch, Slowness, Negative Energy Barrier 7th circle: Greater Heal Undead 8th circle: Dispel Lifeforce, Negative Energy Vortex, Dispel Magic 9th circle: Alter Energy Polarity, Plane Shift, Word of Recall 10th circle: Life Ward, Nether Gate, Shadow Gate, Channel Negative Energy, Hand of Death 11th circle: Entropy Storm, Shadow Vision, Group Recall 12th circle: Death Blessing
NOTE: Spell circles are gained at levels 6, 11, 16, 21, 26, 31, 36, 41, 46, 51 and 56 Use help <spellname> | <skillname> for more information.
Warlock Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- There are no specializations available to Warlocks at this time.
